<h3 id="X38064">X(38064) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(2), X(3), X(6)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 7*a^6-7*(b^2+c^2)*a^4-(b^4+18*b^2*c^2+c^4)*a^2+(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(38064) = X(2)+2*X(182) = 4*X(2)-X(1352) = 13*X(2)-X(5921) = 5*X(2)+X(6776) = X(2)-4*X(10168) = 5*X(2)-2*X(11178) = 2*X(2)+X(11179) = 7*X(2)-X(11180) = 7*X(2)-4*X(24206) = 8*X(182)+X(1352) = 10*X(182)-X(6776) = X(182)+2*X(10168) = 5*X(182)+X(11178) = 4*X(182)-X(11179) = 14*X(182)+X(11180) = 7*X(182)+2*X(24206) = 13*X(1352)-4*X(5921) = 5*X(1352)+4*X(6776) = X(1352)-16*X(10168) = 5*X(1352)-8*X(11178) = X(1352)+2*X(11179) = 7*X(1352)-4*X(11180) = 7*X(1352)-16*X(24206)
</b>
<p>
The locus of the centroid in a Lemoine porism (triangles sharing circumcircle and Lemoine inellipse with ABC) is a circle with center X(38064).  (Randy Hutson, May 19, 2020)
</p>
<p>
X(38064) lies on these lines: {2,98}, {3,597}, {4,20190}, {5,10541}, {6,549}, {20,25555}, {30,5085}, {69,15702}, {140,599}, {141,15694}, {146,25566}, {193,15721}, {373,26255}, {376,3618}, {381,3589}, {511,3524}, {515,38089}, {517,38023}, {518,3653}, {519,38029}, {524,5050}, {527,38115}, {528,38119}, {529,38120}, {575,631}, {576,3523}, {611,5298}, {613,4995}, {632,15069}, {952,38087}, {971,38088}, {1350,12100}, {1351,15693}, {1353,15533}, {1386,3654}, {1428,10056}, {1503,5055}, {2030,7736}, {2330,10072}, {2549,6034}, {2930,11694}, {3066,37904}, {3090,25561}, {3091,25565}, {3098,15053}, {3525,34507}, {3526,8550}, {3530,11477}, {3534,5480}, {3543,19130}, {3545,11645}, {3564,11539}, {3763,10124}, {3818,5071}, {3839,29012}, {5026,11632}, {5032,10519}, {5033,7753}, {5066,36990}, {5067,18553}, {5093,15707}, {5097,15719}, {5486,32154}, {5544,15448}, {5569,22677}, {5652,9175}, {5762,38086}, {5840,38090}, {5845,38065}, {5846,38066}, {5847,38068}, {5848,38069}, {5849,38070}, {5965,33748}, {5969,7618}, {6329,15700}, {6593,20126}, {6699,15303}, {6795,34094}, {7606,7615}, {7622,14645}, {8541,35486}, {8584,15701}, {8703,18583}, {9041,10246}, {9044,32232}, {9971,13363}, {10182,10250}, {10303,11160}, {10304,14853}, {10510,15361}, {10516,15699}, {11163,37450}, {11183,21732}, {11284,35266}, {11812,15534}, {12007,22165}, {13334,32985}, {13335,33215}, {13339,19127}, {14216,14787}, {14810,15698}, {14912,15709}, {15688,29181}, {15697,33751}, {15703,18440}, {15720,20583}, {15723,34573}, {15805,34351}, {15812,19129}, {16962,36758}, {16963,36757}, {17504,31884}, {19145,32788}, {19146,32787}, {21850,34200}, {26446,28538}, {28194,38049}, {28198,38035}, {28204,38047}, {28208,38167}, {28466,36741}, {29317,33750}, {31152,37649}, {33273,35424}</p>
<p>
X(38064) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3, 14848}, {3545, 25406}, {5032, 10519}, {5050, 5054}, {10304, 14853}, {14912, 21356}<br>
X(38064) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10304, 17508), (10516, 15699), (14848, 597), (20423, 14848), (21358, 11539), (31884, 17504), (38072, 38079)<br>
X(38064) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 182, 11179), (2, 6776, 11178), (2, 11179, 1352), (2, 11180, 24206), (3, 597, 20423), (182, 10168, 2), (182, 22112, 11579), (376, 3618, 5476), (376, 5476, 31670), (3618, 5092, 31670), (5032, 15708, 10519), (5085, 38110, 14561), (5092, 5476, 376), (5642, 22112, 2), (6036, 18800, 19905), (14912, 15709, 21356), (38029, 38118, 38116), (38072, 38079, 14561)<br>
</p>
